title: Replay and reprocessing capability
summary: A controlled way to re-drive messages/events/files after fixes or downstream outages.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Middleware modernization fails operationally when incidents require manual, ad hoc replays.
whenNotToUse: You can safely ignore and drop failed work (rare)

gotchas: Replays can break ordering or duplicates
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Replay requires: idempotency, correlation, and a clear operator workflow.
